name: CODE_INT_COMB_LN
description: This table holds the combined service lines created by code integration.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the hosp acct record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CODE_INT_REV_CODE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the revenue code for the combined service line.

columns.name: CODE_INT_REV_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: CODE_INT_CPT
columns.description: This item holds the CPT(R)/HCPCS code for the combined service line.

columns.name: CODE_INT_MOD_1_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the first modifier for the combined service line.

columns.name: CODE_INT_MOD_1_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.

columns.name: CODE_INT_MOD_2_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the second modifier for the combined service line.

columns.name: CODE_INT_MOD_2_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.

columns.name: CODE_INT_MOD_3_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the third modifier for the combined service line.

columns.name: CODE_INT_MOD_3_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.

columns.name: CODE_INT_MOD_4_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the fourth modifier for the combined service line.

columns.name: CODE_INT_MOD_4_ID_MODIFIER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the modifier record.

columns.name: CODE_INT_RATE
columns.description: This item holds the daily rate for the combined service line. The rate is only set for accommodation (room charge) revenue codes.

columns.name: CODE_INT_DATE
columns.description: This item holds the service date for the combined service line.

columns.name: CODE_INT_QTY
columns.description: This item holds the quantity (number of units) for the combined service line.

columns.name: CODE_INT_AMT
columns.description: This item holds the full charge amount for the combined service line. The value includes any non-covered amount for the line.

columns.name: CODE_INT_NONCVRD
columns.description: This item holds the non-covered amount for the combined service line.

columns.name: CODE_INT_LN_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: This item holds the source for the CPT(R)/HCPCS code and modifiers for the combined service line.

columns.name: CODE_INT_UNUSED_YN
columns.description: This item identifies lines that are not true service lines but represent coded CPT(R)/HCPCS codes that cannot be used to create actual service lines.

columns.name: CODE_INT_CHRG_CNT
columns.description: This item holds the number of charges associated with the combined service line.

columns.name: CODE_INT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: This item identifies the reason the coded CPT(R)/HCPCS code could not be used in an actual service line.  This item is only set when the unused coded CPT(R)/HCPCS flag (CODE_INT_UNUSED_YN) is Yes.
